name: Unidentified Hogwarts student
animagus: Brown dog, black and white cat or eagle (possibly)
patronus: Either a white stallion, unicorn, Abraxan, tiger, cheetah, leopard, Spotted Hare, Mountain Hare or Lop-Eared Rabbit
alias_names: The Hero of Hogwarts (by Penny Haywood)
The Clobberer of Curses (by Bill Weasley)
The Pulverizer of Polar Platemail (by Bill Weasley)
Curse-Breaker (by many including Andre Egwu, Skye Parkin and Patricia Rakepick)
New Fan (formerly by Face Paint Kid)
